Text: No, these are standalone installers for the updates. You can either install them separately, or integrate them into a Windows 2000 installation disc.

Hi!

I need help with this torrent. 

This torrent contains all updates for Win 2000 from the beginning right?

Now I have a Windows 2000 SP4 ISO image. Beside of the Rollup 1 "pack" what updates should be installed to update Windows 2000 SP4 with all latest updates?
